body: LEAD: Arthur Davis ran for two touchdowns as South Shore beat Sheepshead Bay, 15-6, yesterday at South Shore's home field in Brooklyn. title: SCHOOL SPORTS: P.S.A.L.; South Shore Goes to 3-0
